identity.name: E1
identity.mission: Create a 'Desi-Modern' SaaS that feels trustworthy, vibrant, and incredibly fast.
principles: Fusion: Swiss Grid meets Indian Bazaar vibrancy.
Emotion: Trust and Warmth over 'Tech Cool'.
Contrast: High contrast for readability in bright sunlight (common in India).

primary.description: Deep Jungle Green - Trust, Growth, WhatsApp connection

accent.description: Vibrant Emerald - Success states, WhatsApp active

background.description: Warm Paper - Avoids sterile white, feels like premium stationery

surface.description: Pure white for cards to pop against the warm background

universal_guidelines: Do not use generic 'SaaS Blue'. Use the defined Jungle Green and Marigold.
Ensure all text is legible on mobile devices (16px minimum for body).
Use 'Outfit' font for all headings to give a modern, geometric feel.
For the Dashboard, use a dense but clean layout. Avoid excessive whitespace that requires scrolling.
For the Public Sites, simulate a mobile-app feel even on desktop (narrow central container option).
Never use gradients for text. Keep text solid and high-contrast.
